trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av denne klassen er sendt til en <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>metode som kalles når en <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>kallet er fullført.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>metoder send en forespørsel om Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)-oppdatering asynkront og venter på en tilsvarende ICMP Oppdater svarmelding.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>egenskapen inneholder resultatene for ICMP Oppdater forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som inneholder data som beskriver et forsøk på å sende meldingen Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) Oppdater forespørselen og får tilsvarende ICMP Oppdater svar.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>er ikke <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, bør du ikke bruke verdiene som returneres av den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>Egenskaper vil returnere null, og <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>egenskapen returnere `null`.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"></xref> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver resultatet av ICMP Oppdater forespørselen.
